item.title: Finding Large Files Uncacheable in Acquia Varnish
item.description: Acquia varnish cannot cache files >10MB as per https://docs.acquia.com/acquia-cloud/performance/varnish/files/ To find for those >10MB files, search from the sites/default/files: find ./ -type f -size +10M -exec du -sh '{}' \; -print|grep -v ^\./| sort -n
